title: Delete (Global)
name: DeleteEntry
description: Delete a specific entry. (will also remove the entry from all feeds)

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
    {
      "id": "KAJFDA7GFTRE87FDS78F7",
      "applicationId": "KAJDFE7GFTRE87FDS78F7",
      "data": "Hello, I'm Son Gocu and this is my first post.",
      "tagList": [
        "First",
        "Awesome"
      ],
      "createStamp": "1415637736",
    }

examples.title: Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
    {
      "id": "KAJFDA7GFTRE87FDS78F7",
      "applicationId": "KAJDFE7GFTRE87FDS78F7",
      "feedId": "KAJDFE7GFTRE87FDS78F7",
      "data": "Hello, I'm Son Gocu and this is my first post.",
      "tagList": [
        "First",
        "Awesome"
      ],
      "createStamp": "1415637736",
    }

title: Create (Global)

    }

title: Remove (Feed)
name: RemoveEntry
description: Removes a specific entry from a feed.

Success 200.description: The Id of the application the feed belongs to

examples.content:

      "channelId": "ASJDH86ASD678ASDASD768",
      "applicationId": "KAJFDA786FDS87FDS78F6",
      "tagList": [
        "Saiyan",
        "Dragon Ball",
        "Dragon Ball Z"
      ],
      "createStamp": "1415637736",
    }
